name: Inactivity system

format: This project involves making a small smart home temperature regulation system. The system is based around a centralized hub, which has a RFID scanner, to let each individual in the home have their own ID chips, with which they can “check-in” into the home.   When doing so, the hub sends the ID of the user to the web server, which then sends out a user defined temperature profile for temperature sensing units around the house. The temperature sensing units have the job, to measure whether the room/house is within the user defined temperature profile, and if not this will be indicated on the sensor unit with LEDs and hopefully later on with actuation to get closer to the temperature desired. The sensing unit will also send up the measured temperature to the cloud, so it can be displayed on the web application.   The hub will be using MQTT with Maqiatto as MQTT broker, and node-red as the backend system and web application.
